channel.title: ERROR MESSAGE: "/start.bin"
channel.description:
Hi Axolotier!! :blush: I am here again cause my discovering of this little treasure is still goin' on :slight_smile: Now....I have updated my software version...I have the 1.0.10 When I start the soft in the window appears the following message:
Connected Authentic Axoloti Core search path : /Users/Francesca/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/objects Axoloti says: file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/start.bin"
What does this error mean??
Thanks a lot big family :+1:

right

item.title: ERROR MESSAGE: "/start.bin"
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

its more an information message ... nothing to worry about
it just means that you don't have a startup patch on your axoloti.

its linked with the fact you can upload a patch to automatically run when your axoloti is powered up (see below)
this is usually used when you want to run axoloti 'standalone' without a computer.

Read full topic

item.title: ERROR MESSAGE: "/start.bin"
item.dc:creator: @marierose marie rose
item.description:
@marierose wrote:

Hi Axolotier!!
I am here again cause my discovering of this little treasure is still goin' on
Now....I have updated my software version...I have the 1.0.10
When I start the soft in the window appears the following message:

Connected
Authentic Axoloti Core
search path : /Users/Francesca/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/objects
Axoloti says: file error: FR_NO_FILE, filename:"/start.bin"

What does this error mean??

Thanks a lot big family

Read full topic
